column1: I'm happy to be home with my family today and wish you a great Thanksgiving.  Even in a year like 2020 we truly are blessed. https://t.co/BkuQrDHg8M

Today I'm thankful for family neighbors friends volunteers and front-line workers who are making an impact in their community by helping one another during a year when looking out for the interests of others could not be more important.  #thankfulthursday https://t.co/6DAmi0WyGi

I proudly serve God and served our nation in the military. This is a slap in the face to our service men and women who put their lives on the line to protect the freedom we have in America to worship God. https://t.co/Y1rBonv5JO
Today and every day we salute and honor my fellow veterans who have served in the U.S. Armed Forces. Thank you for your courage sacrifice and bravery. https://t.co/obs0FzogeQ
Celebrating 245 years of the Marine Corps today! Thank you for your service. #marinecorpsbirthday https://t.co/9Wai0FikY2
